thread.title: Liverpool press conference LIVE: Jurgen Klopp speaks ahead of the FA Cup clash with Plymouth
thread.title_full: Liverpool press conference LIVE: Jurgen Klopp speaks ahead of the FA Cup clash with Plymouth

author: Hamish Mackay
title: Liverpool press conference LIVE: Jurgen Klopp speaks ahead of the FA Cup clash with Plymouth
text:
Jurgen Klopp's press conference (Photo: PA) Share 09:51 Morning all... 
Jurgen Klopp is due out shortly to talk team news and more ahead of their FA Cup third round clash with Plymouth Argyle. 
Liverpool host the League Two side at 1.30pm on Sunday, and the German is expected to field a relatively inexperienced side for the game. 
Plymouth are currently on a run of two straight defeats and will know they face an incredibly tough task on Merseyside. 
Klopp is due out to speak to the press at 10am, so stick with us as we bring you live updates from the clubâ€™s Melwood training ground. Share
